name: VIP Roulette - Lucky Casino Chips
description:
It's time to up the stakes!

Set max bets, choose to stand or take the risk... Backed by an epic casino track, with great simulated casino action, this is the casino app to download if you want to up your roulette game in a high-stakes, online environment.

Featuring:
* Stylish graphics
* Awesome soundtrack
* Simulated casino environment
* Leaderboard
